page.title: 10WALROW WOOD
page.content: TWO GROWING TIMBER BASED HOUSING NEEDS ARE NOW CATERED FOR,THE FIRST IS THE PROVISION OF HARD WOOD.DOUBLE GLAZING UNITS AND THE SECOND IS THE PROVISION OF DEVIDING FRAMES FOR THE INTERIAL WALLS OF MODERN HOUSES. IN COMPETITION WITH THE GROWING NUMBER OF FIRMS PROVIDING ALUMINIUM WINDOWS AND DOORS,THE THERMALUX MAHOGONY WINDOWS ARE FINDING AN INCREASING ACCEPTANCE DUE TO THEIR APPEARANCE AND LONG LASTING PROPERTIES. TIMBER FRAME INTERIAL CONSTRUCTION ISSTEADILY INCREASING.BUILDERS CAN DESIGN,WITH THE FIRM OF MANUFACTURERS PRECISELY WHAT THEY NEED AND CAN BE ASSURED OF DELIVERY DATES. NEW AUTOMATIC MACHINERY ENABLES MANUFACTURE TO BE SPEEDED UP. THE WORK AND THE WORKFORCE IS INCREASING.
